channel.title: 10,000 Drum Machines
channel.description: An ever-growing collection of web-based drum machines and sequencers

item.title: Famous Number Sequences Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine that generates rhythms based on famous mathematical number sequences

item.title: No Common Time
item.description: A drum machine that explores unusual time signatures and rhythmic patterns

item.title: Centre of Mass Drums
item.description: A drum sequencer based on setting the 'centre of mass' of the drum pattern, by Chris Johnson

item.title: (White Album) Noise Machine
item.description: A noise machine inspired by the White Album

item.title: Boots And Cats Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine based on the "boots and cats" beatboxing pattern

item.title: So Many Drums
item.description: A drum machine with an extensive collection of sounds

item.title: De Bruijn Sequence Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine using De Bruijn sequences for pattern generation

item.title: Knight's Tour Drum Sequencer
item.description: A drum sequencer based on the Knight's Tour chess problem

item.title: White Noise (Drum) Machine
item.description: A drum machine that uses white noise to create rhythmic patterns

item.title: Random Drums 2
item.description: Another random drum pattern generator by Jeanette Andrews

item.title: Random Drums 1
item.description: A random drum pattern generator by Jeanette Andrews

item.title: Extremely Long-Term Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine designed for extremely long-term rhythmic patterns

item.title: Binary Number Conversion Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine that converts binary numbers into rhythmic patterns

item.title: Typing/Phonetic Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine that creates rhythms based on typing and phonetic patterns

item.title: Logic Gate Drum Machine
item.description: A drum machine that uses logic gates to create rhythmic patterns
